131211.content:
“Alright Leah, in order for use to ace this and finally beat Maya and her baby Kylie....... I’ll have to lay down some strict rules.”
“Well what do you have in mind?”

1. You will have to use your diapers 24/7 that includes peeing and messing
2. We will be setting up various play dates with: Clara and baby Taylor, Olya and baby Kristina, Kenzie and baby Grace and Gabby and baby Maggie
3. You will have to watch Disney junior and play with toddler toys for your playtime
4. Ride in car seats and eat in high chairs
5. For whatever reason I’m busy I will be handing you off to either your sister Rachel or your mother
